samples.context: Paheli and Boojho had visited the forest along with Professor Ahmad and Tibu. They were eager to share their experiences with their classmates.
samples.question: Who visited the forest with Paheli and Boojho?

samples.context: Other children in the class were eager to share their experiences as some of them had visited Bharatpur Sanctuary.
samples.question: Which sanctuary did some children visit?

samples.context: Some others had heard about Kaziranga National Park, Lockchao Wildlife Sanctuary, Great Nicobar Biosphere Reserve and Tiger Reserve, etc.
samples.question: What is one of the parks mentioned in the text?

samples.context: They were eager to share their experiences with their classmates.
